程序包 frogger.controller

类 StartScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • frogger.controller.StartScreenController
  • public class StartScreenController
extends java.lang.Object

    HomeController

    The StartScreenController class is a controller for Start Screen

    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Wenzheng Shan
    另请参阅:

      private javafx.scene.control.Button instruction
      The instruction Button switch to the instruction screen when clicked

      Called when the exit is clicked and exit the application
      (专用程序包) void switchToInstruction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Called when the instruction is clicked and show the instruction page
      (专用程序包) void switchToStartScreen​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Called when the start is clicked and switch to the select screen
